feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for BTCpay
  • v5.9.2 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9591

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.1...v5.9.2

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes a bug causing reminders not to send for users who have lock_invoices option turned on.
  • v5.9.3 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.2...v5.9.3

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BTCPay updates by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9605
  • Add twig linting by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9607
  • v5.9.4 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9609
  • Fixes for timezones
  • Fixes for Krona decimal resolution
  • Fixes for mobile HTML variable replacements

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.3...v5.9.4

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for task rounding (down) by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9631

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.4...v5.9.5

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improved query efficiency in the Client Portal
  • PayPal Advanced credit cards
  • Add Nordigen filters
  • Add Nordigen account id to transformer
  • Fixes for line breaks in email text body
  • Fixes for rounding tasks down
  • Fixes for Expense excport preview props
  • Rerun Timezone migrations
  • Add twig linter
  • BTCPay updates
  • Add current company route
  • Migrate statics into singletons (instead of cache)
  • v5.9.6 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9640

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.5...v5.9.6
